Kalyug, directed by the eminent Shyam Benegal, was produced by Shashi Kapoor. 

It remains one of the most complex and modern takes on the epic Mahabharat. It‚Äôs the tale of viscious competition between two business families who are actually related to each other. The warring cousins would go to any length to win the battle of business. There are no good or bad here, everyone are grey in this plot. Caught in between them is a hapless orphan Karan (subtly donned by Shashi Kapoor) who works for one group while his step-brothers are on the opposite side.

It had a fanstastic star cast who fitted the bill to the T - Shashi Kapoor, Rekha, Raj Babbar, Supriya Pathak, Anant Nag, Kulbhushan Kharbanda, Sushma Seth, Victor Bannerjee, Reema Lagoo, and A.K. Hangal. 

A compelling watch.
Perhaps the best of Shashi Kapoor. What a plot and at the same time casting ? Never felt watching a movie. A fantastic scipt and superb acting. Very contemporary. Great job by Shyam Benegal.
